name: ObservationDefinition.category
title: ObservationDefinition.category
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: A code that classifies the general type of observation.
element.comment: This element allows various categorization schemes based on the ownerâ€™s definition of the category and effectively multiple categories can be used for one instance of ObservationDefinition. The level of granularity is defined by the category concepts in the value set.
element.requirements: Used for filtering what kinds of observations are retrieved and displayed.

binding.description: Codes for high level observation categories.
